entry.question: What happens if I have both Thrust and Dirge in their Brave modes?
entry.answer: The attacker chooses which character with Brave they would like to attack.

entry.question: For Thrust’s Revenge ability, can I play the Upgrade on a character like Dreadwing or Raider Tailwind?
entry.answer: Yes, you may play an upgrade on a Plane or Seeker provided the character being upgraded meets the requirement of the upgrade.
